title: Submit a Report Date to the BOC for approval
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user creates a Report Date tx
AND the tx is in edit or view mode in a preliminary or rejected state
custom_expected:
THEN the system updates the status to "Submitted to BOC"
AND the system creates an entry in green font in the Player's Player History: Code = REPDT, Description = Report Date, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields
AND an approval item will be generated and display on the BOC - Major Transactions - Admin's Approvals widget

title: BOC user I want to approve a report date transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC approver in a Report Date tx
AND tx is in Preliminary, Submitted to BOC and Rejected states.
custom_expected:
THEN the tx status will update to Approved
AND a blue notification will display
AND the approval item will be removed from the approvals clipboard
AND set the player's MJ Roster Status to Active
AND update Player's Player History: Code = REPDT, Description = Report Date, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields to be in black font

title: BOC user I want to reject a report date transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC approver in a Report Date tx
AND tx is in Submitted to BOC state
custom_expected:
THEN the status is updated to Rejected
AND a blue reject notification is displayed
AND the item is removed from the approvals clipboard
AND Reverse player's pending org and club, Pending MJ Roster Status and Pending MN Roster Status
AND Remove pending player history entry

title: Action item for club user, created from a Major/Minor Outright tx being submitted for Org players that requires a MN Contract to be dismissed when creating a MN C for the player
custom_preconds: GIVEN a Major/Minor Outright tx is submitted
custom_steps:
WHEN the player requires a MN Contract
AND a MN Contract is created
custom_expected: THEN the action item will be removed from the Action Widget

title: Action item created for a club user from a Major/Minor Outright tx being submitted for Org player that requires an Addendum C to be dismissed when creating an Addendum C for the player
custom_preconds: GIVEN a Major/Minor Outright tx being submitted
custom_steps:
WHEN the player requires an Add C
AND a Add C is created
custom_expected: THEN an action item will be removed

title: Action item created for a club user from an Optional Assignment tx being submitted for Org player that requires an Addendum C to be dismissed when creating an Addendum C for the player
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is an Optional Assignment tx being submitted
custom_steps:
WHEN the player requires an Add C
AND a Add C is created
custom_expected: THEN an action item will be removed

title: Action item created for club user from an Optional Assignment tx being submitted for Org player that requires a MN Contract to be dismissed when creating a MN C for the player
custom_preconds: GIVEN an Optional Assignment tx is being sumbitted
custom_steps:
WHEN the player requires a Minor Contract
AND a Minor Contract is created
custom_expected: THEN an action item will be removed

title: BOC user, approving a Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A) transaction to terminate a player's minor league contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN a BOC user has a Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A) tx
custom_expected:
THEN it will expire a player's current minor league contract. 
AND Player's minor contract status updates to 'Terminated'. 
AND Automatic comment generated on the contract (should not overwrite existing text but add to existing text). "Terminated by [username] on [date, time stamp] via [transaction name]"

title: BOC user reversing a Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A) tx to un-terminate any minor league contracts that were terminated as a result of the tx being approved
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user has a Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A) tx
AND its in a state of Approved
custom_expected:
THEN it will "unterminate" any minor contract that was marked Terminated as a result of the approval of the transaction. 
AND The state of the minor league contract will be returned to its previous state.

title: BOC user, approving an elect free agency tx to expire a player's minor league contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC approver
AND an elect free agency tx
custom_expected:
THEN the players current minor league contract will expire
AND Player's minor contract status updates to 'Expired'. 
AND Contract Status on contract will say "Expired". 
AND Automatic comment generated on the contract. "Expired by [username] on [date, time stamp] via [transaction name - article name]"

title: BOC user, reversing an elect free agency tx to un-expire any minor league contracts that were expired as a result of the elect free agency tx being approved
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC approver
AND an elect free agency tx
custom_expected:
THEN it will "unexpire" any minor contract that was marked Expired as a result of the approval of the transaction. 
AND The state of the minor league contract will be returned to its previous state.

title: Add a new Authorized Signatory for MJ and/or MN Transactions from the Authorized Signatory widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has edit permissions
custom_steps: WHEN checking MJ Trans or MN Trans authorized signatory
custom_expected: THEN they will ultimately appear as a possible Authorized Signatory on any MJ Tx or MN tx

title: Search for Elect Free Agency tx by Election Type
custom_preconds: GIVEN "Transaction Type" is selected as a filter under "Transactions", "Elect Free Agency" is an option
custom_steps: WHEN  Selecting "Elect Free Agency" as the Transaction Type will prompt a 4th "Article" dropdown to appear
custom_expected:
THEN The fourth dropdown will contain the possible election articles, and "All" per the requirements.
AND The default option will be "All".
AND Running the search will take into account the entered criteria and return the correct population of transactions.

title: The "Insurance Date" field on a selection to MJ Roster is editable post submission
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on a Selection to MJ Roster tx
custom_steps: WHEN the tx is in a state of Submitt, Approved, or Reversed
custom_expected: THEN The "Received Insurance Form" field should be editable for both BOC users and the Org the transaction was created for

title: Optional assignment completes a 26th man process
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a  “Reinstate from DL” or “Reinstate from IL”
custom_steps: WHEN 26th man appointment checkbox is checked within last 2 days
custom_expected: THEN description on the player's history should append “(completes the 26th Man process)”.

title: BOC user can enter club season dates faster with a quick entry feature
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC user
custom_steps:
WHEN on the club season dates screen
AND the Bulk populate button is available
AND selecting a column and entering a date
custom_expected:
THEN user should only be able to select a valid date (mm/dd/yyyy)
AND Clicking Apply will populate the selected column with the entered date for the League currently selected 
AND Will not impact other Leagues - meaning this must be done for each League. 
AND Clicking Save will save the changes made using the Bulk Populate feature. 
AND Clicking Cancel and confirming the cancellation will cancel the changes. 
AND When BOC enters a date in the quick entry field, it populates all dates in the column with that date.
